pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of the United States of America, Donald Trump | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with United States President Donald Trump about progress towards ratification of the new North American Free Trade Agreement.

The Prime Minister also offered his condolences to the President for the loss of life and those injured in the attack that took place at Naval Air Station Pensacola. 

The two leaders looked forward to working closely together and staying in touch through the final stages of the negotiations.
